price: A ako posrnete, nakon što su vam došli jasni dokazi, onda znajte da je Allah, zaista, silan i mudar.
arabic: فَإِن زَلَلۡتُم مِّنۢ بَعۡدِ مَا جَآءَتۡكُمُ ٱلۡبَيِّنَٰتُ فَٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَزِيزٌ حَكِيمٌ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: fa-in zalaltum min baʿdi mā jāatkumu al-bayinātu fa-iʿ'lamū anna al-laha ʿazīzun ḥakīmun
